title: Інструкція.ЮА
overview: Instruction.UA is a YouTube show about what Ukrainians are made ofUkrainians still do not have a tablet in which they can find answers to basic and at the same time fundamental questions about themselves. Who are we? What do we want? What is the meaning of our existence? How are we arranged? What does and doesn't a Ukrainian do? What is the mission of Ukrainians in this world?Instruction.UA is an online tablet on the new worldview YouTube channel "Anthropology" from Suspilne Media. A show with Ivan Semesiuk, where he and his guests seek answers to these questions.The guests of the show are experts from various spheres of Ukrainian life: from culture to business, from humour to war, and from history to politics. The show's goal is to capture Ukrainians in space and time, understand them as best as possible, and ultimately agree among themselves on what to do with all this.
